text: The 2019–20 season was VfL Wolfsburg's 75th season in existence and the club's 23rd consecutive season in the top flight of German football. In addition to the domestic league, VfL Wolfsburg participated in this season's edition of the DFB-Pokal, and also participated in the UEFA Europa League. The season was slated to cover a period from 1 July 2019 to 30 June 2020. It was extended extraordinarily beyond 30 June due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Germany. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Players out on loan=== ==Transfers== ===Transfers in=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:90%; text- align:center; font-size:95%; text-align:left;" |- !# !Position !Player !Transferred from !Fee !Date !Source |- |19 | | | Young Boys |€9,200,000 | | |- |40 | | | LASK Linz |€3,500,000 | |Offiziell: Wolfsburg schlägt bei Joao Victor zu, kicker.de, 10 May 2019 |- |6 | | | FC Ingolstadt |€1,100,000 | | |- |24 | | | Red Bull Salzburg |€15,000,000 | | |- |22 | | | Red Bull Salzburg |€10,000,000 | | |} ====Loans in==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:90%; text-align:center; font-size:95%; text-align:left;" |- !# !Position !Player !Loaned from !Date !Loan expires !Source |- |22 | | | Manchester City | | | |} ===Transfers out=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:90%; text-align:center; font-size:95%; text-align:left;" |- !# !Position !Player !Transferred to !Fee !Date !Source |- |30 | | | SpVgg Greuther Fürth |€300,000 | |Paul Seguin bleibt bei Greuther Fürth, kicker.de, 7 May 2019 |- |35 | | | SC Freiburg |€2,500,000 | |Itter joins Freiburg, vfl- wolfsburg.de, 27 May 2019 |- |3 | | | FC Twente |Free | | |- |24 | | | Hannover 96 |Free | |Hannover 96 verpflichtet Sebastian Jung aus Wolfsburg, bundesliga.com, 23 June 2019 |- |9 | | | Anderlecht |€5,000,000 |rowspan=2| | |- |18 | | | Charleroi |€3,500,000 |Sporting Charleroi sign Nigerian striker Victor Osimhen permanently from Wolfsburg, goal.com, 31 May 2019 |- |6 | | | Vitesse |Undisclosed | | |- |21 | | |Free agent |Free | | |} ====Loans out==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="width:90%; text-align:center; font- size:95%; text-align:left;" |- !# !Position !Player !Loaned to !Date !Loan expires !Source |- |34 | | | Greuther Fürth | | | |- |21 | | | Kayserispor | | | |- |17 | | | FC Augsburg | | | |- |29 | | | VVV-Venlo | | | |- |37 | | | 1.
